      • moveTo

        public void moveTo​(Node n)
        Attempts to move the explorer from the current position to the Node n. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if n is not neighboring. Increments the steps taken if successful.
        Specified by:
        moveTo in interface EscapeState
        Parameters:
        n - A neighboring Node

      • pickUpGold

        public void pickUpGold()
        Description copied from interface: EscapeState
        Picks up any gold on the current tile. You must first check that there is gold before picking it up.

        Throw an IllegalStateException if there is no gold at the current location, either because there never was any or because you picked it up already.

        Specified by:
        pickUpGold in interface EscapeState

      • getTimeRemaining

        public int getTimeRemaining()
        Description copied from interface: EscapeState
        Return the time remaining to escape from the cavern. This value changes with every call to moveTo(Node), and if it reaches 0 before you escape, you have failed to escape.
        Specified by:
        getTimeRemaining in interface EscapeState
